item.title: Percy Sledge - When a Man Loves a Woman - Baritone Ukulele - Key of C
item.description: Play along video for the song When a Man Loves a Woman performed by Percy Sledge. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D7, Em, F, G7.

item.title: Percy Sledge - When a Man Loves a Woman - Key of C
item.description: Play along video for the song When a Man Loves a Woman performed by Percy Sledge. Chords used in the song: Am, C, D7, Em, F, G7.

item.title: Ike & Tina Turner - Proud Mary - Key of C
item.description: Play along video for the song Proud Mary performed by Ike & Tina Turner. Chords used in the song: Am, C, G.

item.title: Amy Winehouse - Rehab
item.description: Play along video for the song Rehab performed by Amy Winehouse. Chords used in the song: Am, A♭, C, Em, F, G7.

item.title: Otis Redding - Sittin' On The Dock Of The Bay - Key of G
item.description: Play along video for the song Sittin' On The Dock Of The Bay performed by Otis Redding. Chords used in the song: A, B7, C, D, F, G.
